CSV¶

Create a CSV instance which can be used by param to get and run param sets

class dap.csv.CSV(csv_file, delimiter=', ')¶

Class which allows csv to be used with param.py

Parameters:
  • csv_file (string) – path to csv file
  • delimiter (string) – csv delimiter
getRecords()¶

Get the records in the file

Returns:A list of dictionaries with paramaters.
sheet()¶

Get csv object from the given file

Returns:csv object
update_cell(i, j, text)¶

Update the text of a cell in the file

Parameters:
  • i (int) – The row of the cell (index 0)
  • j (int) – The column of the cell (index 0)
  • text (string) – The text to update the cell with
